title: Standard Ebooks: liberated ebooks, carefully produced for the true book lover
author: tosh
aiHeadline: Standard Ebooks: Because regular ebooks just aren't good enough for you, the discerning snob who thinks they're the only true book lover left in the world.

title: The “S” in MCP Stands for Security
author: skilldeliver
aiHeadline: The 'S' in MCP Stands for Security: Because who doesn't love a feature that's added as an afterthought to make everyone feel slightly less vulnerable?

title: Self-Driving Teslas Are Fatally Rear-Ending Motorcyclists More Than Any Other
author: NotInOurNames
aiHeadline: Self-Driving Teslas Are Fatally Rear-Ending Motorcyclists More Than Any Other Brand: Because what's the point of having a car that drives itself if it can't even avoid hitting the people who are literally the definition of 'easy to miss'?

title: Recent AI model progress feels mostly like bullshit
author: paulpauper
aiHeadline: Recent AI Model Progress Feels Mostly Like Bullshit: Because who needs actual breakthroughs when you can just throw more money at the problem and call it 'progress'?

title: Gumroad's Interestingly Timed "Open-Source" Play
author: pier25
aiHeadline: Gumroad's Interestingly Timed 'Open-Source' Play: Because what better way to distract everyone from your shady business practices than by suddenly deciding to share your code, probably because you're running out of other excuses?
